Origami is a free tool for designing modern user interfaces. Quickly put together a prototype, run it on your iPhone or iPad, iterate on it, and export code snippets your engineers can use.

We built Origami to help us design many of our products at Facebook, including Instagram, Paper, Messenger, Slingshot, Rooms, and Groups. We're excited to see what people make with it.

Present in Style

Show off your designs in presentations with full screen, backgrounds, and a number of different of devices. All while controlling your prototype with an iPhone or iPad running Origami Live.

Try our presentation controls.

  • F
  • -
  • +
  • H

Convert to Code

Export code snippets to iOS, Android, and the web with a click.

Origami can now export code for the parts of your prototypes you used to have to tediously spec to engineers. Now with the click of a button, you can deliver your animation specs as code to your engineers that they can copy-and-paste into the project.

This uses our free, open source animation frameworks to deliver the exact same feel across all platforms: Pop for iOS, Rebound for Android, and Rebound JS for the web.

Take a look at some sample code this generated.

  • iOS .m
  • Android .java
  • Web .js

Get started today.

Download Origami and quickly get up and running with examples, tutorials, documentation, and a helpful community.

    v2.0 1/30/15

Become an expert, fast.

  • Examples
    We’ve got 60 examples showing how to build common interactions and UI you’ve seen before. There's a good chance we’ve got an example file for what you’re building.
  • Tutorials
    New to Origami? Not a problem. Be an expert at prototyping in Origami by following our step-by-step tutorials.
  • Documentation
    Get detailed descriptions of all of the components of Origami.
  • Community
    If you’ve got questions about how to build something particular or how Origami works, or want to share what you’re working on, there’s a community of friendly folks ready to help.
